name: webpack-php-setup
description: Webpack + Core PHP setup with live reloading PHP

scripts.start: rmdir /s /q dist & xcopy includes dist\includes /I && webpack serve
scripts.dev: rmdir /s /q dist & xcopy includes dist\includes /I && webpack --mode=development
scripts.prod: rmdir /s /q dist & xcopy includes dist\includes /I && webpack --mode=production

author: Mumtaz Ahmed Siddiqui
